Self.Wiki: Defines Ashes of War, including unique AoW. Determines AoW animation.\nBehaviour data remains in BehaviourParam. Unique AoW data is with the weapon and not with other AoW data.

swordArtsType.Wiki: Offset for TAE animation. 0 is a600. To pass to the behavior script to determine which swashbuckler

useMagicPoint_L1.Wiki: MP consumed when issuing arts by L1

useMagicPoint_L2.Wiki: MP consumed when issuing arts by L2

useMagicPoint_R1.Wiki: MP consumed when issuing arts by R1

useMagicPoint_R2.Wiki: MP consumed when issuing arts by R2

iconId.Wiki: The icon for this sword art.

usabilityTextId.Wiki: The text ID for the usability description.
